Hello!
I'm Nachiket

I design websites and User interfaces for startups

I am a designer by way of a scientist. I studied biology and worked in research for many years before realizing that my heart lay in design.

I am currently a senior designer at Content Thread, a boutique web development and design consulting company. As the lead in-house designer, I tackle all things design-related internally as well as for our clients.

Previously, I was a UI/UX designer at BitPay, a bitcoin startup. The design team works to make BitPay's payment processing service a great user experience.

I believe my strengths lie in product design, and I enjoy working on interesting ideas with interesting people. I'm a proponent of content-first design as well as good typography— it makes a world of difference.

I am available for select freelance work. You can take a look at some of my projects, follow me on twitter, or just shoot me an email to say hello.

Made with Jekyll— the source code for this site is on Github.

Typefaces are Freight Sans Pro and Rooney Web, hosted by Typekit.

You can see my resume too.
